name: 陳晏笙
objective: 本課程由學生與老師共同選定題目，在特定題目下對此專題之問題定義，分析，推理，設計，製作與解決方法進行研究，以完成該專題之成品，專題完成後需撰寫書面報告並公開展示成品，以培養實務工作之能力。專題範圍包含：1.電子電路，2.電子儀表，3.控制與通訊系統，4.電子視聽系統，5.微電腦為基礎之計算機硬體（含軟體）製作，6.軟體設計與製作（PC，工作站），影像處理與計算機視覺，多媒體製作（動畫、Video、Audio及其整合），9.其他。
schedule:

Week 1: How to Do an Excellent Research in the Course of Special Topic?
Week 2: Lecture 1 - Digital Microwave Communication
Week 3: Lecture 1 - Digital Microwave Communication

Week 5: Lecture 2 - Antenna Theory and the Associated Parameters
Week 6: Lecture 2 - Antenna Theory and the Associated Parameters

Week 8: Lecture 3 - Antenna Family

Week 10: Demonstration of DTV Antennas
Week 11: Demonstration of DTV Antennas
Week 12: Design of Handset Antennas
Week 13: Seminar
Week 14: Seminar 
Week 15: Seminar
Week 16: Seminar
Week 17: Seminar
Week 18: Seminar

name: 蔡偉和

In this course,students will conduct special project under the guidance of his advisor.The topic of this project,selected and decided by bath the student and his advisor,could be chosen form(but not limited to)
1.Electronic circuits
2.Electronic instrumentation
3.Communication and control systems
4.Microprocessor applications
5.Multimedia system designs
6.Computer networks
7.Computer software desgin
